name: Zero Context
description:
This is now my second visual novel holy

I uh just posted this here so my friends could play it but Ill provide description anyways. I am currently experimenting with trying to make a visual novel with absolutely no experience and Im having fun doing so ;> also there is no visuals so I dont think this even counts as a visual novel but there are some visuals so it technically is one. 

Theres a secret ending btw
